lead_paragraph: Zinédine Zidane has gone from a red card to the top of the French music charts with a song parodying his head butt in the World Cup final. “Coup de Boule,” or the “Head Butt,” pokes fun at Zidane for ramming his head into the chest of the Italian defender Marco Materazzi during the World Cup final July 9.
